attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash
set -ex

sudo systemctl start couchdb
sudo systemctl enable couchdb

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

INTERNAL_IP="@@{address}@@"
HTTP_PORT="5984"
sleep 10
COUNT=0
while true ; do
  output=$(curl --max-time 30 http://${INTERNAL_IP}:${HTTP_PORT}/_up 2>/dev/null)
  if [[ -z "$output" ]]; then
    echo "Waiting for couch db to start."
  else
    break
  fi
  sleep 5
  COUNT=$(($COUNT+1))
  if [[ $COUNT -eq 12 ]]; then
    echo "Error: Starting Couchdb"
    exit 1
  fi
done

attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash
set -ex

sudo hostnamectl set-hostname --static @@{name}@@

echo '[bintray--apache-couchdb-rpm]
name=bintray--apache-couchdb-rpm
baseurl=http://apache.bintray.com/couchdb-rpm/el$releasever/$basearch/
gpgcheck=0
repo_gpgcheck=0
enabled=1' | sudo tee /etc/yum.repos.d/apache-couchdb.repo

sudo yum update -y --quiet
sudo yum install -y --quiet epel-release lvm2 lsscsi
sudo yum install -y --quiet couchdb

# -*- Data Disk configuration
sudo vgcreate couchdbDataVG /dev/sdb /dev/sdc /dev/sdd
sudo lvcreate -l 100%FREE -i3 -I1M -n couchdbDataLV couchdbDataVG
sudo lvchange -r 0 /dev/couchdbDataVG/couchdbDataLV
sudo mkfs.xfs -K /dev/couchdbDataVG/couchdbDataLV
echo "/dev/couchdbDataVG/couchdbDataLV /var/lib/couchdb xfs inode64,nobarrier,noatime,logbufs=8 0 0" | sudo tee -a /etc/fstab

sudo mount -a
sudo chown -R couchdb:couchdb /var/lib/couchdb

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

COUCHDB_USER="@@{COUCHDB_USER}@@"
COUCHDB_PASSWORD="@@{COUCHDB_PASSWORD}@@"
COUCHDB_SECRET="@@{COUCHDB_SECRET}@@"
IP="@@{address}@@"
PORT=5984

#sudo sed -i "s/-name couchdb@127.0.0.1/-name couchdb@${IP}/" /opt/couchdb/etc/vm.args

sudo systemctl start couchdb
sudo systemctl enable couchdb
sleep 10

curl -X POST -H "Content-Type: application/json" http://127.0.0.1:5984/_cluster_setup -d "{\"action\": \"enable_cluster\", \"bind_address\":\"0.0.0.0\", \"username\":\"${COUCHDB_USER}\",\"password\":\"${COUCHDB_PASSWORD}\", \"node_count\":\"3\"}"

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

if [ @@{calm_array_index}@@ -ne 0 ];then
  exit
fi

IP="@@{address}@@"
PORT=5984
COUCHDB_USER="@@{COUCHDB_USER}@@"
COUCHDB_PASSWORD="@@{COUCHDB_PASSWORD}@@"
ALL_IPS="@@{calm_array_address}@@"
NODE_COUNT=3

for ip in $(echo "${ALL_IPS}" | tr "," "\n"); do
  if [[ "${ip}" != "@@{address}@@" ]]; then
    curl -X POST --user ${COUCHDB_USER}:${COUCHDB_PASSWORD} -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
    -d "{\"action\": \"enable_cluster\", \"bind_address\":\"0.0.0.0\", \"username\": \"${COUCHDB_USER}\", \"password\":\"${COUCHDB_PASSWORD}\", \"port\": 15984, \"node_count\": \"${NODE_COUNT}\", \"remote_node\": \"${ip}\", \"remote_current_user\": \"${COUCHDB_USER}\", \"remote_current_password\": \"${COUCHDB_PASSWORD}\" }" \
    http://${IP}:${PORT}/_cluster_setup || true
    
  	curl -X POST --user ${COUCHDB_USER}:${COUCHDB_PASSWORD} -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  	-d "{\"action\":\"add_node\",\"username\":\"${COUCHDB_USER}\",\"password\":\"${COUCHDB_PASSWORD}\",\"host\":\"${ip}\",\"port\":$PORT,\"singlenode\":false}" \
  	http://${IP}:${PORT}/_cluster_setup || true
  fi
done

curl -X POST --user ${COUCHDB_USER}:${COUCHDB_PASSWORD} -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-d '{"action":"finish_cluster"}' http://${IP}:${PORT}/_cluster_setup

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

# - * - Variables and constants.
COUCHDB_USER="@@{COUCHDB_USER}@@"
COUCHDB_PASSWORD="@@{COUCHDB_PASSWORD}@@"
COUCHDB_SECRET="@@{COUCHDB_SECRET}@@"
CREATE_VOLUME="@@{CREATE_VOLUME}@@"
IP="@@{address}@@"
ALL_IPS="@@{calm_array_address}@@"
NODE_COUNT=$(echo "${ALL_IPS}" | tr ',' '\n' | wc -l)
PORT=5984

CREATE_VOLUME="${CREATE_VOLUME:-no}"

echo '[bintray--apache-couchdb-rpm]
name=bintray--apache-couchdb-rpm
baseurl=http://apache.bintray.com/couchdb-rpm/el$releasever/$basearch/
gpgcheck=0
repo_gpgcheck=0
enabled=1' | sudo tee /etc/yum.repos.d/apache-couchdb.repo

# - * - Install CouchDB

sudo yum update -y --quiet
sudo yum install -y --quiet epel-release lvm2 lsscsi
sudo yum install -y --quiet couchdb

if [ "${CREATE_VOLUME}" == "yes" ]; then
	sudo pvcreate /dev/sd{b,c,d}
	sudo vgcreate couchdbDataVG /dev/sdb /dev/sdc /dev/sdd
	sudo lvcreate -l 100%FREE -i3 -I1M -n couchdbDataLV couchdbDataVG
	sudo lvchange -r 0 /dev/couchdbDataVG/couchdbDataLV
	sudo mkfs.xfs -K /dev/couchdbDataVG/couchdbDataLV
	echo "/dev/couchdbDataVG/couchdbDataLV /var/lib/couchdb xfs inode64,nobarrier,noatime,logbufs=8 0 0" | sudo tee -a /etc/fstab
	sudo mount -a
	sudo chown -R couchdb:couchdb /var/lib/couchdb
fi

# - * - Configure CouchDB

sudo sed -i "s|;admin = mysecretpassword|admin = ${COUCHDB_PASSWORD}|" /opt/couchdb/etc/local.ini
sudo sed -i "s/;bind_address = 127.0.0.1/bind_address = 0.0.0.0/" /opt/couchdb/etc/local.ini

sudo systemctl start couchdb
sudo systemctl enable couchdb
sleep 10

if [ @@{calm_array_index}@@ -ne 0 ];then
  exit
fi

for ip in $(echo "${ALL_IPS}" | tr "," "\n"); do
  if [[ "${ip}" != "@@{address}@@" ]]; then
    curl -X POST --user ${COUCHDB_USER}:${COUCHDB_PASSWORD} -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
    -d "{\"action\": \"enable_cluster\", \"bind_address\":\"0.0.0.0\", \"username\": \"${COUCHDB_USER}\", \"password\":\"${COUCHDB_PASSWORD}\", \"port\": 15984, \"node_count\": \"${NODE_COUNT}\", \"remote_node\": \"${ip}\", \"remote_current_user\": \"${COUCHDB_USER}\", \"remote_current_password\": \"${COUCHDB_PASSWORD}\" }" \
    http://${IP}:${PORT}/_cluster_setup || true
    
  	curl -X POST --user ${COUCHDB_USER}:${COUCHDB_PASSWORD} -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  	-d "{\"action\":\"add_node\",\"username\":\"${COUCHDB_USER}\",\"password\":\"${COUCHDB_PASSWORD}\",\"host\":\"${ip}\",\"port\":$PORT,\"singlenode\":false}" \
  	http://${IP}:${PORT}/_cluster_setup || true
  fi
done

curl -X POST --user ${COUCHDB_USER}:${COUCHDB_PASSWORD} -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-d '{"action":"finish_cluster"}' http://${IP}:${PORT}/_cluster_setup

task_definition_list.description: System action for creating an application
task_definition_list.name: action_create

runbook.description: System action for uninstalling an application
runbook.name: action_uninstall

PORT=5984

CREATE_VOLUME="${CREATE_VOLUME:-no}"

echo '[bintray--apache-couchdb-rpm]

gpgcheck=0
repo_gpgcheck=0
enabled=1' | sudo tee /etc/yum.repos.d/apache-couchdb.repo

# - * - Install CouchDB

sudo yum update -y --quiet
sudo yum install -y --quiet epel-release lvm2 lsscsi
sudo yum install -y --quiet couchdb

if [ "${CREATE_VOLUME}" == "yes" ]; then
	sudo pvcreate /dev/sd{b,c,d}
	sudo vgcreate couchdbDataVG /dev/sdb /dev/sdc /dev/sdd

sudo sed -i "s/;bind_address = 127.0.0.1/bind_address = 0.0.0.0/" /opt/couchdb/etc/local.ini

sudo systemctl enable couchdb
sleep 10

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

if [ @@{calm_array_index}@@ -ne 0 ];then
  exit
fi

IP="@@{private_ip_address}@@"
PORT=5984
COUCHDB_USER="@@{COUCHDB_USER}@@"
COUCHDB_PASSWORD="@@{COUCHDB_PASSWORD}@@"
ALL_IPS="@@{calm_array_private_ip_address}@@"
NODE_COUNT=3

for ip in $(echo "${ALL_IPS}" | tr "," "\n"); do
  if [[ "${ip}" != "@@{private_ip_address}@@" ]]; then
    curl -X POST --user ${COUCHDB_USER}:${COUCHDB_PASSWORD} -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
    -d "{\"action\": \"enable_cluster\", \"bind_address\":\"0.0.0.0\", \"username\": \"${COUCHDB_USER}\", \"password\":\"${COUCHDB_PASSWORD}\", \"port\": 15984, \"node_count\": \"${NODE_COUNT}\", \"remote_node\": \"${ip}\", \"remote_current_user\": \"${COUCHDB_USER}\", \"remote_current_password\": \"${COUCHDB_PASSWORD}\" }" \
    http://${IP}:${PORT}/_cluster_setup || true
    
  	curl -X POST --user ${COUCHDB_USER}:${COUCHDB_PASSWORD} -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  	-d "{\"action\":\"add_node\",\"username\":\"${COUCHDB_USER}\",\"password\":\"${COUCHDB_PASSWORD}\",\"host\":\"${ip}\",\"port\":$PORT,\"singlenode\":false}" \
  	http://${IP}:${PORT}/_cluster_setup || true
  fi
done

curl -X POST --user ${COUCHDB_USER}:${COUCHDB_PASSWORD} -H "Content-Type: application/json" \

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

# - * - Variables and constants.
COUCHDB_USER="@@{COUCHDB_USER}@@"
COUCHDB_PASSWORD="@@{COUCHDB_PASSWORD}@@"
COUCHDB_SECRET="@@{COUCHDB_SECRET}@@"
CREATE_VOLUME="@@{CREATE_VOLUME}@@"
IP="@@{address}@@"
ALL_IPS="@@{calm_array_address}@@"
NODE_COUNT=$(echo "${ALL_IPS}" | tr ',' '\n' | wc -l)
PORT=5984

CREATE_VOLUME="${CREATE_VOLUME:-no}"

echo '[bintray--apache-couchdb-rpm]
name=bintray--apache-couchdb-rpm
baseurl=http://apache.bintray.com/couchdb-rpm/el$releasever/$basearch/
gpgcheck=0
repo_gpgcheck=0
enabled=1' | sudo tee /etc/yum.repos.d/apache-couchdb.repo

# - * - Install CouchDB

sudo yum update -y --quiet
sudo yum install -y --quiet epel-release lvm2 lsscsi
sudo yum install -y --quiet couchdb

if [ "${CREATE_VOLUME}" == "yes" ]; then
	sudo pvcreate /dev/xvd{b,c,d}
	sudo vgcreate couchdbDataVG /dev/xvdb /dev/xvdc /dev/xvdd
	sudo lvcreate -l 100%FREE -i3 -I1M -n couchdbDataLV couchdbDataVG
	sudo lvchange -r 0 /dev/couchdbDataVG/couchdbDataLV
	sudo mkfs.xfs -K /dev/couchdbDataVG/couchdbDataLV
	echo "/dev/couchdbDataVG/couchdbDataLV /var/lib/couchdb xfs inode64,nobarrier,noatime,logbufs=8 0 0" | sudo tee -a /etc/fstab
	sudo mount -a
	sudo chown -R couchdb:couchdb /var/lib/couchdb
fi

# - * - Configure CouchDB

sudo sed -i "s|;admin = mysecretpassword|admin = ${COUCHDB_PASSWORD}|" /opt/couchdb/etc/local.ini
sudo sed -i "s/;bind_address = 127.0.0.1/bind_address = 0.0.0.0/" /opt/couchdb/etc/local.ini

sudo systemctl start couchdb
sudo systemctl enable couchdb
sleep 10

if [ @@{calm_array_index}@@ -ne 0 ];then
  exit
fi

for ip in $(echo "${ALL_IPS}" | tr "," "\n"); do
  if [[ "${ip}" != "@@{address}@@" ]]; then
    curl -X POST --user ${COUCHDB_USER}:${COUCHDB_PASSWORD} -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
    -d "{\"action\": \"enable_cluster\", \"bind_address\":\"0.0.0.0\", \"username\": \"${COUCHDB_USER}\", \"password\":\"${COUCHDB_PASSWORD}\", \"port\": 15984, \"node_count\": \"${NODE_COUNT}\", \"remote_node\": \"${ip}\", \"remote_current_user\": \"${COUCHDB_USER}\", \"remote_current_password\": \"${COUCHDB_PASSWORD}\" }" \
    http://${IP}:${PORT}/_cluster_setup || true
    
  	curl -X POST --user ${COUCHDB_USER}:${COUCHDB_PASSWORD} -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  	-d "{\"action\":\"add_node\",\"username\":\"${COUCHDB_USER}\",\"password\":\"${COUCHDB_PASSWORD}\",\"host\":\"${ip}\",\"port\":$PORT,\"singlenode\":false}" \
  	http://${IP}:${PORT}/_cluster_setup || true
  fi
done

curl -X POST --user ${COUCHDB_USER}:${COUCHDB_PASSWORD} -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-d '{"action":"finish_cluster"}' http://${IP}:${PORT}/_cluster_setup

CREATE_VOLUME="@@{CREATE_VOLUME}@@"
IP="@@{address}@@"
ALL_IPS="@@{calm_array_address}@@"
NODE_COUNT=$(echo "${ALL_IPS}" | tr ',' '\n' | wc -l)
PORT=5984

CREATE_VOLUME="${CREATE_VOLUME:-no}"

echo '[bintray--apache-couchdb-rpm]
name=bintray--apache-couchdb-rpm
baseurl=http://apache.bintray.com/couchdb-rpm/el$releasever/$basearch/
gpgcheck=0
repo_gpgcheck=0
enabled=1' | sudo tee /etc/yum.repos.d/apache-couchdb.repo

# - * - Install CouchDB

sudo yum update -y --quiet
sudo yum install -y --quiet epel-release lvm2 lsscsi
sudo yum install -y --quiet couchdb

if [ "${CREATE_VOLUME}" == "yes" ]; then
	sudo pvcreate /dev/sd{b,c,d}
	sudo vgcreate couchdbDataVG /dev/sdb /dev/sdc /dev/sdd
	sudo lvcreate -l 100%FREE -i3 -I1M -n couchdbDataLV couchdbDataVG
	sudo lvchange -r 0 /dev/couchdbDataVG/couchdbDataLV
	sudo mkfs.xfs -K /dev/couchdbDataVG/couchdbDataLV
	echo "/dev/couchdbDataVG/couchdbDataLV /var/lib/couchdb xfs inode64,nobarrier,noatime,logbufs=8 0 0" | sudo tee -a /etc/fstab
	sudo mount -a
	sudo chown -R couchdb:couchdb /var/lib/couchdb
fi

# - * - Configure CouchDB

sudo sed -i "s|;admin = mysecretpassword|admin = ${COUCHDB_PASSWORD}|" /opt/couchdb/etc/local.ini
sudo sed -i "s/;bind_address = 127.0.0.1/bind_address = 0.0.0.0/" /opt/couchdb/etc/local.ini

sudo systemctl start couchdb
sudo systemctl enable couchdb
sleep 10

if [ @@{calm_array_index}@@ -ne 0 ];then
  exit
fi

for ip in $(echo "${ALL_IPS}" | tr "," "\n"); do
  if [[ "${ip}" != "@@{address}@@" ]]; then
    curl -X POST --user ${COUCHDB_USER}:${COUCHDB_PASSWORD} -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
    -d "{\"action\": \"enable_cluster\", \"bind_address\":\"0.0.0.0\", \"username\": \"${COUCHDB_USER}\", \"password\":\"${COUCHDB_PASSWORD}\", \"port\": 15984, \"node_count\": \"${NODE_COUNT}\", \"remote_node\": \"${ip}\", \"remote_current_user\": \"${COUCHDB_USER}\", \"remote_current_password\": \"${COUCHDB_PASSWORD}\" }" \
    http://${IP}:${PORT}/_cluster_setup || true
    
  	curl -X POST --user ${COUCHDB_USER}:${COUCHDB_PASSWORD} -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  	-d "{\"action\":\"add_node\",\"username\":\"${COUCHDB_USER}\",\"password\":\"${COUCHDB_PASSWORD}\",\"host\":\"${ip}\",\"port\":$PORT,\"singlenode\":false}" \
  	http://${IP}:${PORT}/_cluster_setup || true
  fi
done

curl -X POST --user ${COUCHDB_USER}:${COUCHDB_PASSWORD} -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-d '{"action":"finish_cluster"}' http://${IP}:${PORT}/_cluster_setup

sudo systemctl enable couchdb

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

if [ @@{calm_array_index}@@ -ne 0 ];then
  exit
fi

IP="@@{address}@@"
PORT=5984
COUCHDB_USER="@@{COUCHDB_USER}@@"
COUCHDB_PASSWORD="@@{COUCHDB_PASSWORD}@@"
ALL_IPS="@@{calm_array_address}@@"
NODE_COUNT=3

for ip in $(echo "${ALL_IPS}" | tr "," "\n"); do
  if [[ "${ip}" != "@@{address}@@" ]]; then
    curl -X POST --user ${COUCHDB_USER}:${COUCHDB_PASSWORD} -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
    -d "{\"action\": \"enable_cluster\", \"bind_address\":\"0.0.0.0\", \"username\": \"${COUCHDB_USER}\", \"password\":\"${COUCHDB_PASSWORD}\", \"port\": 15984, \"node_count\": \"${NODE_COUNT}\", \"remote_node\": \"${ip}\", \"remote_current_user\": \"${COUCHDB_USER}\", \"remote_current_password\": \"${COUCHDB_PASSWORD}\" }" \
    http://${IP}:${PORT}/_cluster_setup || true
    
  	curl -X POST --user ${COUCHDB_USER}:${COUCHDB_PASSWORD} -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  	-d "{\"action\":\"add_node\",\"username\":\"${COUCHDB_USER}\",\"password\":\"${COUCHDB_PASSWORD}\",\"host\":\"${ip}\",\"port\":$PORT,\"singlenode\":false}" \

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

CREATE_VOLUME="@@{CREATE_VOLUME}@@"
IP="@@{address}@@"
ALL_IPS="@@{calm_array_address}@@"
NODE_COUNT=$(echo "${ALL_IPS}" | tr ',' '\n' | wc -l)
PORT=5984

CREATE_VOLUME="${CREATE_VOLUME:-no}"

echo '[bintray--apache-couchdb-rpm]
name=bintray--apache-couchdb-rpm
baseurl=http://apache.bintray.com/couchdb-rpm/el$releasever/$basearch/
gpgcheck=0
repo_gpgcheck=0
enabled=1' | sudo tee /etc/yum.repos.d/apache-couchdb.repo

# - * - Install CouchDB

sudo yum update -y --quiet
sudo yum install -y --quiet epel-release lvm2 lsscsi
sudo yum install -y --quiet couchdb

if [ "${CREATE_VOLUME}" == "yes" ]; then
	sudo pvcreate /dev/sd{b,c,d}
	sudo vgcreate couchdbDataVG /dev/sdb /dev/sdc /dev/sdd
	sudo lvcreate -l 100%FREE -i3 -I1M -n couchdbDataLV couchdbDataVG
	sudo lvchange -r 0 /dev/couchdbDataVG/couchdbDataLV
	sudo mkfs.xfs -K /dev/couchdbDataVG/couchdbDataLV
	echo "/dev/couchdbDataVG/couchdbDataLV /var/lib/couchdb xfs inode64,nobarrier,noatime,logbufs=8 0 0" | sudo tee -a /etc/fstab
	sudo mount -a
	sudo chown -R couchdb:couchdb /var/lib/couchdb
fi

# - * - Configure CouchDB

sudo sed -i "s|;admin = mysecretpassword|admin = ${COUCHDB_PASSWORD}|" /opt/couchdb/etc/local.ini
sudo sed -i "s/;bind_address = 127.0.0.1/bind_address = 0.0.0.0/" /opt/couchdb/etc/local.ini

sudo systemctl start couchdb
sudo systemctl enable couchdb
sleep 10

if [ @@{calm_array_index}@@ -ne 0 ];then
  exit
fi

for ip in $(echo "${ALL_IPS}" | tr "," "\n"); do
  if [[ "${ip}" != "@@{address}@@" ]]; then
    curl -X POST --user ${COUCHDB_USER}:${COUCHDB_PASSWORD} -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
    -d "{\"action\": \"enable_cluster\", \"bind_address\":\"0.0.0.0\", \"username\": \"${COUCHDB_USER}\", \"password\":\"${COUCHDB_PASSWORD}\", \"port\": 15984, \"node_count\": \"${NODE_COUNT}\", \"remote_node\": \"${ip}\", \"remote_current_user\": \"${COUCHDB_USER}\", \"remote_current_password\": \"${COUCHDB_PASSWORD}\" }" \
    http://${IP}:${PORT}/_cluster_setup || true
    
  	curl -X POST --user ${COUCHDB_USER}:${COUCHDB_PASSWORD} -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  	-d "{\"action\":\"add_node\",\"username\":\"${COUCHDB_USER}\",\"password\":\"${COUCHDB_PASSWORD}\",\"host\":\"${ip}\",\"port\":$PORT,\"singlenode\":false}" \
  	http://${IP}:${PORT}/_cluster_setup || true
  fi
done

curl -X POST --user ${COUCHDB_USER}:${COUCHDB_PASSWORD} -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-d '{"action":"finish_cluster"}' http://${IP}:${PORT}/_cluster_setup

attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash
set -ex

sudo systemctl start couchdb
sudo systemctl enable couchdb

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

INTERNAL_IP="@@{address}@@"
HTTP_PORT="5984"
sleep 10
COUNT=0
while true ; do
  output=$(curl --max-time 30 http://${INTERNAL_IP}:${HTTP_PORT}/_up 2>/dev/null)
  if [[ -z "$output" ]]; then
    echo "Waiting for couch db to start."
  else
    break
  fi
  sleep 5
  COUNT=$(($COUNT+1))
  if [[ $COUNT -eq 12 ]]; then
    echo "Error: Starting Couchdb"
    exit 1
  fi
done

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

# - * - Variables and constants.
COUCHDB_USER="@@{COUCHDB_USER}@@"
COUCHDB_PASSWORD="@@{COUCHDB_PASSWORD}@@"
COUCHDB_SECRET="@@{COUCHDB_SECRET}@@"
CREATE_VOLUME="@@{CREATE_VOLUME}@@"
IP="@@{address}@@"
ALL_IPS="@@{calm_array_address}@@"
NODE_COUNT=$(echo "${ALL_IPS}" | tr ',' '\n' | wc -l)
PORT=5984

CREATE_VOLUME="${CREATE_VOLUME:-no}"

echo '[bintray--apache-couchdb-rpm]
name=bintray--apache-couchdb-rpm
baseurl=http://apache.bintray.com/couchdb-rpm/el$releasever/$basearch/
gpgcheck=0
repo_gpgcheck=0
enabled=1' | sudo tee /etc/yum.repos.d/apache-couchdb.repo

# - * - Install CouchDB

sudo yum update -y --quiet
sudo yum install -y --quiet epel-release lvm2 lsscsi
sudo yum install -y --quiet couchdb

if [ "${CREATE_VOLUME}" == "yes" ]; then
	sudo pvcreate /dev/sd{b,c,d}
	sudo vgcreate couchdbDataVG /dev/sdb /dev/sdc /dev/sdd
	sudo lvcreate -l 100%FREE -i3 -I1M -n couchdbDataLV couchdbDataVG
	sudo lvchange -r 0 /dev/couchdbDataVG/couchdbDataLV
	sudo mkfs.xfs -K /dev/couchdbDataVG/couchdbDataLV
	echo "/dev/couchdbDataVG/couchdbDataLV /var/lib/couchdb xfs inode64,nobarrier,noatime,logbufs=8 0 0" | sudo tee -a /etc/fstab
	sudo mount -a
	sudo chown -R couchdb:couchdb /var/lib/couchdb
fi

# - * - Configure CouchDB

sudo sed -i "s|;admin = mysecretpassword|admin = ${COUCHDB_PASSWORD}|" /opt/couchdb/etc/local.ini
sudo sed -i "s/;bind_address = 127.0.0.1/bind_address = 0.0.0.0/" /opt/couchdb/etc/local.ini

sudo systemctl start couchdb
sudo systemctl enable couchdb
sleep 10

if [ @@{calm_array_index}@@ -ne 0 ];then
  exit
fi

for ip in $(echo "${ALL_IPS}" | tr "," "\n"); do
  if [[ "${ip}" != "@@{address}@@" ]]; then
    curl -X POST --user ${COUCHDB_USER}:${COUCHDB_PASSWORD} -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
    -d "{\"action\": \"enable_cluster\", \"bind_address\":\"0.0.0.0\", \"username\": \"${COUCHDB_USER}\", \"password\":\"${COUCHDB_PASSWORD}\", \"port\": 15984, \"node_count\": \"${NODE_COUNT}\", \"remote_node\": \"${ip}\", \"remote_current_user\": \"${COUCHDB_USER}\", \"remote_current_password\": \"${COUCHDB_PASSWORD}\" }" \
    http://${IP}:${PORT}/_cluster_setup || true

  	-d "{\"action\":\"add_node\",\"username\":\"${COUCHDB_USER}\",\"password\":\"${COUCHDB_PASSWORD}\",\"host\":\"${ip}\",\"port\":$PORT,\"singlenode\":false}" \
  	http://${IP}:${PORT}/_cluster_setup || true
  fi
done

curl -X POST --user ${COUCHDB_USER}:${COUCHDB_PASSWORD} -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-d '{"action":"finish_cluster"}' http://${IP}:${PORT}/_cluster_setup

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

if [ @@{calm_array_index}@@ -ne 0 ];then
  exit
fi

IP="@@{address}@@"
PORT=5984
COUCHDB_USER="@@{COUCHDB_USER}@@"
COUCHDB_PASSWORD="@@{COUCHDB_PASSWORD}@@"
ALL_IPS="@@{calm_array_address}@@"
NODE_COUNT=3

for ip in $(echo "${ALL_IPS}" | tr "," "\n"); do
  if [[ "${ip}" != "@@{address}@@" ]]; then
    curl -X POST --user ${COUCHDB_USER}:${COUCHDB_PASSWORD} -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
    -d "{\"action\": \"enable_cluster\", \"bind_address\":\"0.0.0.0\", \"username\": \"${COUCHDB_USER}\", \"password\":\"${COUCHDB_PASSWORD}\", \"port\": 15984, \"node_count\": \"${NODE_COUNT}\", \"remote_node\": \"${ip}\", \"remote_current_user\": \"${COUCHDB_USER}\", \"remote_current_password\": \"${COUCHDB_PASSWORD}\" }" \
    http://${IP}:${PORT}/_cluster_setup || true
    
  	curl -X POST --user ${COUCHDB_USER}:${COUCHDB_PASSWORD} -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  	-d "{\"action\":\"add_node\",\"username\":\"${COUCHDB_USER}\",\"password\":\"${COUCHDB_PASSWORD}\",\"host\":\"${ip}\",\"port\":$PORT,\"singlenode\":false}" \
  	http://${IP}:${PORT}/_cluster_setup || true
  fi
done

curl -X POST --user ${COUCHDB_USER}:${COUCHDB_PASSWORD} -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-d '{"action":"finish_cluster"}' http://${IP}:${PORT}/_cluster_setup
attrs.name: CouchDB Install and Configure

attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash
set -ex

# - * - Variables and constants.
COUCHDB_USER="@@{COUCHDB_USER}@@"
COUCHDB_PASSWORD="@@{COUCHDB_PASSWORD}@@"
COUCHDB_SECRET="@@{COUCHDB_SECRET}@@"
CREATE_VOLUME="@@{CREATE_VOLUME}@@"
IP="@@{address}@@"
ALL_IPS="@@{calm_array_address}@@"
NODE_COUNT=$(echo "${ALL_IPS}" | tr ',' '\n' | wc -l)
PORT=5984

CREATE_VOLUME="${CREATE_VOLUME:-no}"

echo '[bintray--apache-couchdb-rpm]
name=bintray--apache-couchdb-rpm
baseurl=http://apache.bintray.com/couchdb-rpm/el$releasever/$basearch/
gpgcheck=0
repo_gpgcheck=0
enabled=1' | sudo tee /etc/yum.repos.d/apache-couchdb.repo

# - * - Install CouchDB

sudo yum update -y --quiet
sudo yum install -y --quiet epel-release lvm2 lsscsi
sudo yum install -y --quiet couchdb

if [ "${CREATE_VOLUME}" == "yes" ]; then
	sudo pvcreate /dev/sd{b,c,d}
	sudo vgcreate couchdbDataVG /dev/sdb /dev/sdc /dev/sdd
	sudo lvcreate -l 100%FREE -i3 -I1M -n couchdbDataLV couchdbDataVG
	sudo lvchange -r 0 /dev/couchdbDataVG/couchdbDataLV
	sudo mkfs.xfs -K /dev/couchdbDataVG/couchdbDataLV
	echo "/dev/couchdbDataVG/couchdbDataLV /var/lib/couchdb xfs inode64,nobarrier,noatime,logbufs=8 0 0" | sudo tee -a /etc/fstab
	sudo mount -a
	sudo chown -R couchdb:couchdb /var/lib/couchdb
fi

# - * - Configure CouchDB

sudo sed -i "s|;admin = mysecretpassword|admin = ${COUCHDB_PASSWORD}|" /opt/couchdb/etc/local.ini
sudo sed -i "s/;bind_address = 127.0.0.1/bind_address = 0.0.0.0/" /opt/couchdb/etc/local.ini

sudo systemctl start couchdb
sudo systemctl enable couchdb
sleep 10

if [ @@{calm_array_index}@@ -ne 0 ];then
  exit
fi

for ip in $(echo "${ALL_IPS}" | tr "," "\n"); do
  if [[ "${ip}" != "@@{address}@@" ]]; then
    curl -X POST --user ${COUCHDB_USER}:${COUCHDB_PASSWORD} -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
    -d "{\"action\": \"enable_cluster\", \"bind_address\":\"0.0.0.0\", \"username\": \"${COUCHDB_USER}\", \"password\":\"${COUCHDB_PASSWORD}\", \"port\": 15984, \"node_count\": \"${NODE_COUNT}\", \"remote_node\": \"${ip}\", \"remote_current_user\": \"${COUCHDB_USER}\", \"remote_current_password\": \"${COUCHDB_PASSWORD}\" }" \
    http://${IP}:${PORT}/_cluster_setup || true
    
  	curl -X POST --user ${COUCHDB_USER}:${COUCHDB_PASSWORD} -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  	-d "{\"action\":\"add_node\",\"username\":\"${COUCHDB_USER}\",\"password\":\"${COUCHDB_PASSWORD}\",\"host\":\"${ip}\",\"port\":$PORT,\"singlenode\":false}" \
  	http://${IP}:${PORT}/_cluster_setup || true
  fi
done

curl -X POST --user ${COUCHDB_USER}:${COUCHDB_PASSWORD} -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-d '{"action":"finish_cluster"}' http://${IP}:${PORT}/_cluster_setup
